product.name: Modern Coffee Table
product.description: Elevate your living room with the Modern Coffee Table. Sleek and minimalist design, crafted with attention to detail. Features a spacious tabletop for decor and a storage shelf for convenience. Sturdy construction ensures lasting durability. Rated at 4.5 stars.

product.name: Leather Recliner Chair
product.description: Indulge in comfort with the Leather Recliner Chair. Luxurious leather upholstery, ergonomic design, and reclining function for relaxation. Perfect blend of style and relaxation. Rated at 4.7 stars.

product.name: Dining Table Set
product.description: Gather around the Dining Table Set for memorable meals. Complete set with spacious table and comfortable chairs. Contemporary design and durable build. Ideal for family gatherings. Rated at 4.2 stars.

product.name: Wooden Bookshelf
product.description: Organize your space with the Wooden Bookshelf. Ample storage for books and decor. Classic design blends seamlessly with any decor style. Sturdy and functional. Rated at 4.0 stars.

product.name: Sofa Bed
product.description: Maximize space with the Sofa Bed. Stylish sofa by day, comfortable bed by night. Versatile and perfect for guests. Sleek design and easy transformation. Rated at 4.8 stars.
